alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Beauregard and northwestern Calcasieu Parishes, southwestern Newton and southeastern Jasper Counties through 645 PM CST... At 556 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over mainly rural areas of southern Jasper... southern Newton... counties in southeast Texas and into southwest Louisiana... northern Calcasieu parish and southern Beauregard parish. Storms are moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kirbyville, Singer, Call, Fields, De Quincy, Buna, Ragley, Longville, Trout Creek, Bivens, Old Salem, Mt. Union, Gillis, Wrights Settlement, Devils Pocket, Bancroft, Oretta and Bleakwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
